meanings.definition: relating to the shaft of a long bone
meanings.sent1: The diaphysial part of the bone provides structural support.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the diaphysial characteristics of bones to understand their strength.
meanings.sent3: The diaphysial bone was so strong, it could withstand heavy pressure.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the diaphysial bone.
meanings.sent5: The diaphysial nature of the bone made it resilient to fractures.
